(1, 1, 1): Sa gha Day, Fourfold Assembly Day
(2, 1, 1): Cambodian, Lao, Burmese, Sri Lankan and Thai Therav da Buddhists
(4, 1, 1): A historical meeting was held between the Buddha and his first 1,250 disciples
(6, 1, 1): procession with light, general merit-making activities
(7, 1, 1): Full moon day of the 3rd lunar month
(9, 1, 1): Chotrul Duchen (in Tibet), Daeboreum (in Korea),  Kosh gatsu (in Japan),  Lantern Festival (in China),  T t Nguy n ti u (in Vietnam)
